alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Trinity; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 13 at 3:20AM PST until February 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Humboldt Interior, Northern Trinity, Southern Trinity, Northwestern Mendocino Interior and Northeastern Mendocino Interior Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 4 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Trinity; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity
